      • LevelBuilder

        public LevelBuilder(ILevel level,
            BeaverRun3D br3d)
        This creates a new level builder.
        Parameters:
        level - A level class implimenting ILevel.
        br3d - A reference to this classes creator for later use.

      • buildLevel

        public void buildLevel()
                throws Exception
        This method is responcible for building the scene graph. Based on presets x,y, and z it places the lanes and trucks in the scene properly spaced and allined.
        Throws:
        Exception
